TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PageCatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart
Public NotInheritable Class PageCatalogPart Inherits CatalogPart

summary.span: 提供一个目录，该目录保存的是对用户在单个 Web 部件页上关闭的所有 控件（以及 区域包含的其他服务器控件）的引用，使用该目录用户可以将已关闭的控件添加回页。

span.span: Provides a catalog that keeps references to all controls (and other server controls contained in zones) that a user has closed on a single Web Parts page, which enables users to add the closed controls back to the page.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在 Web 部件页面上有一个非常具体的用途： 充当页目录以维护之前添加到某个用户已关闭，页，以便用户可以将它们添加到页面的所有控件。The class serves one very specific purpose on a Web Parts page: it acts as a page catalog to maintain any controls previously added to the page that a user has closed, so that the user can add them back to the page. 仅在网页上正在目录的显示模式，一种特殊的视图，使用户可以添加和删除在页上的控件时，此控件才可见。This control is visible only when a Web page is in catalog display mode, a special view that enables users to add and remove controls on the page. 添加如果你想要为用户提供的灵活性关闭并重新打开控件的控制转移到你的页面。Add a control to your page if you want to provide users with the flexibility of closing and reopening controls. 如果你的页面不允许用户根本关闭控件，则无需添加控件添加到你的页面。If your page does not allow users to close controls at all, there is no need to add a control to your page. 仅已关闭的控件添加到页目录中。Only closed controls are added to the page catalog. 已关闭的控件具有多个属性：A closed control has several attributes: - 不在页上可见。It is not visible on the page. - 页上，它不会呈现。It is not rendered on the page. - 它不参与页生命周期阶段。It does not participate in page life-cycle phases. 关闭控件是不同的删除它，这样永久从页中删除。Closing a control is different from deleting it, which permanently removes it from the page. 用户可以重新打开关闭的控件实例从页目录，但用户删除控件后，他或她可以永远不会恢复该特定实例。A user can reopen a closed control instance from a page catalog, but after a user deletes a control, he or she can never recover that specific instance. 最常用和最方便的方法添加到页上的控件是通过声明以页持久性格式。The most common and convenient way to add a control to a page is by declaring it in page persistence format. 与使用任何声明性控件，控件必须在网页上声明 ASP.NET 标记元素的正确上下文中。As with any declarative control, a control must be declared within the proper context of ASP.NET markup elements on a Web page. 有关如何声明的工作代码示例在网页中的控制，请参阅本主题的示例部分。For a working code example of how to declare a control in a Web page, see the Example section of this topic. 必须向页面添加下面的声明性的元素序列：You must add the following sequence of declarative elements to the page: 1. ``必须声明元素，和子``元素必须添加到它能够包含任何声明在区域中的控件。An `` element must be declared, and a child `` element must be added to it to contain any controls declared in the zone. 2. ``元素必须添加的子级为``元素。An `` element must be added as a child of the `` element. 也可能出现其他控件作为子元素的声明``元素，包括或控件。There might also be other controls declared as child elements of the `` element, including or controls. 类具有只有一个可用的属性，属性，用于重写基属性，以便可以为页目录中提供的默认标题，如果不提供任何值。The class has only one usable property, the property, which overrides the base property so that a default title can be provided for the page catalog if no value is supplied. 剩余属性类重写继承的属性，但不是实际用于呈现控件。The remaining properties for the class override the inherited properties, but are not actually used for rendering the control. 重写，则仅以便特殊代码可以将属性设置对它们以类似的设计工具中隐藏这些[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]。They are overridden only so that special code attributes can be set on them to hide them from design tools like [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 因为它们具有不会影响呈现，不应使用这些隐藏的属性。You should not use these hidden properties, because they have no effect on rendering. 它们隐藏的智能感知和 Visual Studio 中的属性窗格中的事实可帮助避免错误地使用它们的开发人员。The fact that they are hidden from IntelliSense and the Properties pane in Visual Studio helps developers avoid using them by mistake. 在其各自的帮助主题中，这种情况下注明了这些隐藏的所有属性。All these hidden properties are noted as such in their respective Help topics. 类还具有几个重要的方法。The class also has several important methods. 方法检索每个对象控件在页目录中，这样控件来显示有关每个服务器控件的信息，而无需创建该控件的实例。The method retrieves a object for each control in the page catalog, which enables a control to display information about each server control without having to create an instance of that control. 另一个方法是方法。Another method is the method. 此方法获取的特定实例基于传递给方法的说明的控制。This method gets an instance of a particular control, based on the description passed to the method. ## 可访问性Accessibility 默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准，如 Web 内容辅助功能准则 1.0 (WCAG) 优先级别 1 准则。The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards such as the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 1.0 (WCAG) priority 1 guidelines. 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0)。For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用以声明方式在网页上的控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control declaratively on a Web page. 此示例具有四个部分：This example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 网页包含控件，控件，和一个控件。A Web page that contains a control, a control, and a control. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 该示例的工作原理时加载浏览器中说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 在页面顶部是两个卡`register`指令、 用户控件和已编译包含两个自定义的组件控件。At the top of the page are two `register` directives, one for the user control and one for the compiled component that contains the two custom controls. 请注意，该页有以声明方式引用控件，嵌套在适当的层次结构的声明性的元素，如本主题的备注部分中所述。Notice that the page has a declarative reference to the control, nested within the proper hierarchy of declarative elements as described in the Remarks section of this topic. 此外，还有``元素，它引用包含对一个标准 ASP.NET控制和两个自定义控件，这些全部都是用户可以从目录选择的控件。There is also an `` element, which contains references for a standard ASP.NET control and the two custom controls, all of which are the controls that users can select from the catalog. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/PageCatalogPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/PageCatalogPartVB.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例的第三部分是对这两个源代码控件。The third part of the code example is the source code for the two controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 当加载浏览器中时，选择**目录模式**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，你可以查看可供添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 添加一个控件，然后使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以返回页后，可以浏览模式。Add one of the controls, then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 每个控件，标题栏中单击谓词菜单 （向下箭头），然后单击**关闭**来关闭控件。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and click **Close** to close the control. 使页返回到目录模式，并请注意你关闭的控件，现在出现在页目录中，而是可供添加回页面。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that the control you closed now appears in the page catalog, and is available to be added back to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数是默认值; 没有构造函数声明中类，因此没有特殊的任务不会执行创建类的新实例时。The constructor is a default; no constructor is declared in the class and hence no special tasks are carried out when a new instance of the class is created. .NET Framework 内部使用构造函数来创建类的实例。The .NET Framework uses the constructor internally to create an instance of the class. 很有可能，但可能性不大，需要使用构造函数以编程方式在你自己的代码。It is possible, but unlikely, that you will need to use the constructor programmatically in your own code. 控件的预期的用途是供网页开发人员将其添加到页面以声明方式在设计时。The intended use of the control is for page developers to add it to a page declaratively at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，作为的成员控制，则不使用的 Web 部件控件集来呈现该控件中的任意位置。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;将其设置不起上呈现。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，代码特性设置在其上为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 当你处理的Visual Studio 中的控件属性不是在属性窗格或 IntelliSense 中可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果你想要使用此属性，你需要创建自定义类继承自类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义的类可以使用继承属性作为它，或重写此方法并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

summary.span: 返回目录中可用 控件的说明的集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available controls in a catalog.

returns.span: ，包含页目录中每个已关闭 控件的 。

span.span: A that contains a for each closed control in a page catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一个实现抽象的基方法声明中类。The method provides an implementation for the abstract base method declared in the class. 方法返回目录中的每个控件的说明信息。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. A对象包含有关的基本信息控件，包括其 ID，对该控件，并继承自的几个重要属性的值的对象引用类，如和。A object contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the class, such as and . 方法可以提高性能。The method improves performance. 创建目录时，它需要包含，包括标题、 说明、 一个图标 （如果存在） 和一个 id。 每个控件有关的一些信息When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 而不是无需创建要获取此信息，每个控件实例区域创建一个目录调用方法对于每个控件的目录，并调用将返回仅的说明信息控件。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a zone that creates a catalog calls the method for each control that will be in the catalog, and the call returns only the description information for the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例具有四个部分：This example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 网页包含控件和引用多个服务器控件的控件。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用的事件处理代码方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 该示例的工作原理时加载浏览器中说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义的源代码控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三个部分是包含的 Web 页控件。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意，`Button1_Click`方法调用方法中，包含的说明控件在页目录中，并将写入一个标签的详细信息。Notice that the `Button1_Click` method calls the method, obtains the descriptions of the controls in the page catalog, and writes the details to a label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/PageCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/PageCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 当加载浏览器中时，选择**目录模式**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，你可以查看可供添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 将一个或多个控件添加到页上，以及如何将**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以返回页后，可以浏览模式。Add one or more controls to the page, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 单击一个或多个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），然后单击**关闭**。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one or more of the controls, and click **Close**. 使页返回到目录模式，并请注意或多个你关闭的控件现在显示在页目录中，而且可用于添加回页面。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that the control or controls you closed now appear in the page catalog, and are available to be added back to the page. 单击**显示 web 部件说明**按钮可以将有关页目录中的控件的详细信息写入到的标签。Click the **Display WebPart descriptions** button to write the details about the controls in the page catalog to the label.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回对引用其说明详细信息匹配的值的控件对象传递给方法。The method returns a reference to a control whose description details match the values of the object passed into the method. 通常情况下，此方法使用连同方法，用于检索在目录中的所有控件的说明。Typically, this method is used together with the method, which is used to retrieve the descriptions of all the controls in the catalog. 单个控件然后可以检索或操作根据需要通过传递单个对象添加到方法。Individual controls can then be retrieved or manipulated as needed by passing individual objects to the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. 此示例具有四个部分：This example has four parts: - 一个用户控件，使你能够更改 Web 部件页面上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件。A source code file that contains two custom controls. - 网页包含控件和引用多个服务器控件的控件。A Web page that contains a control and a control that references several server controls. 该页还包含调用的事件处理代码方法。The page also contains the event-handling code that calls the method. - 该示例的工作原理时加载浏览器中说明。An explanation of how the example works when you load the page in a browser. 此代码示例的第一部分是使用户能够更改在网页上的显示模式的用户控件。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页面上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#7)] 下面的代码示例的第二部分是两个自定义的源代码控件。The second part of the code example is the source code for the two custom controls. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 你可以显式编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以在站点的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将动态编译运行时将源代码。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示的编译这两种方法的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/userinfowebpart.cs#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/userinfowebpart.vb#6)] 该示例的第三个部分是包含的 Web 页控件。The third part of the example is the Web page that contains the control. 请注意，`Button2_Click`方法获取的说明在目录中，调用控件方法来检索页中的所有控件集合，目录，然后将这些控件添加回页面。Notice that the `Button2_Click` method obtains the descriptions of the controls in the catalog, calls the method to retrieve all the controls in the page catalog for a collection, and then adds those controls back to the page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/CS/PageCatalogPart_GetCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Get/VB/PageCatalogPart_GetVB.aspx#1)] 当加载浏览器中时，选择**目录模式**中**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以切换到目录模式。When you load the page in a browser, select **Catalog Mode** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch to catalog mode. 在目录模式下，你可以查看可供添加到页面的控件。In catalog mode, you can see the controls that are available to be added to the page. 将一个或多个控件添加到页上，以及如何将**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以返回页后，可以浏览模式。Add one or more controls to the page, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to browse mode. 单击一个或多个控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单 （向下箭头），然后单击**关闭**。Click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of one or more of the controls, and click **Close**. 使页返回到目录模式，并请注意现在控件或你关闭的控件出现在页目录中，并提供要添加回页面。Return the page to catalog mode, and notice that now the control or controls you closed appear in the page catalog, and are available to be added back to the page. 单击**添加 web 部件控件**按钮以将页目录中的控件添加回页面。Click the **Add WebPart Controls** button to add the controls in the page catalog back to the page. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件，以将页返回到正常浏览模式; 添加将在页上可见的控件。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to return the page to normal browse mode; the controls you added are visible on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，作为的成员控制，则不使用的 Web 部件控件集来呈现该控件中的任意位置。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;将其设置不起上呈现。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，代码特性设置在其上为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 当你处理的Visual Studio 中的控件属性不是在属性窗格或 IntelliSense 中可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果你想要使用此属性，你需要创建自定义类继承自类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义的类可以使用继承属性作为它，或重写此方法并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性，作为的成员控制，则不使用的 Web 部件控件集来呈现该控件中的任意位置。The property, as a member of the control, is not used anywhere within the Web Parts control set for rendering the control. 因此，不应使用此属性;将其设置不起上呈现。Therefore, you should not use this property; setting it has no effect on rendering. 若要防止开发人员使用此属性，代码特性设置在其上为在 Visual Studio 中隐藏它。To prevent developers from using this property, code attributes are set on it to hide it in Visual Studio. 当你处理的Visual Studio 中的控件属性不是在属性窗格或 IntelliSense 中可见。When you work with a control in Visual Studio, the property is not visible in the Properties pane or IntelliSense. 如果你想要使用此属性，你需要创建自定义类继承自类。If you want to use this property, you need to create a custom class that inherits from the class. 自定义的类可以使用继承属性作为它，或重写此方法并更改其行为。The custom class can either use the inherited property as it is, or override it and change its behavior. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property.

Public Overrides Property Title As String

summary.span: 获取或设置在控件标题栏中显示的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title that appears in the control's title bar.

value.span: 用作控件标题的字符串。

span.span: A string that is used as the title of the control.

value.span: 默认值是 Web 部件控件集提供的、计算出的控件名称。

span.span: The default value is a calculated control name supplied by the Web Parts control set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的标题栏中显示属性值控制在目录模式可见控件时。The property value is displayed in the title bar of a control when the control is visible in catalog mode. 当控件被声明在页中时，你可以通过使用设置属性的值`Title`属性。When the control is declared in a page, you can set a value for the property by using the `Title` attribute. 如果未提供标题的值，特定于区域性的默认值用于描述此控件允许用户编辑的属性的类型。If you do not supply a value for the title, a culture-specific default value is used to describe the kind of properties that this control allows users to edit. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 有关所需要运行该示例的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 下面的源代码演示如何设置声明性的标记中的控件上的属性。The following source code shows how to set the property on the control in declarative markup. 如果你未设置属性，或分配了一个空字符串 ("")，提供默认标题。If you do not set the property, or if you assign an empty string (""), a default title is supplied. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/CS/PageCatalogPartCS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PageCatalogPart_Overview/VB/PageCatalogPartVB.aspx#2)]
